allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Video background teaser page

- First video plays once on page load
- Replay video loops infinitely after first ends
- Naver button appears elegantly on replay start
- Responsive design for all screen sizes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
